name: The Holy Monkey Nihonzaru
description:
Somewhere in the far north of Shikoku Island, the wild life happens without human influence.

This is a story about a conflict between snow monkeys, where you are Nihonzaru, a brave monkey disposed to help his tribe to recover the access to the thermal waters, blocked by a gang of evil monkeys.

In this journey, you will explore a huge map and discover another quests. Enjoy this original old-school RPG, and feel the nostalgia of the golden era of RPG Maker 2000 games.

Controls: Z to select/interact and X to return/open menu.
